references.paper_title: You only look once: Unified, real-time object detection
references.reason: This paper is foundational for the YOLO family of object detection models used in this paper.
This paper introduces Fast R-CNN, a widely used and influential object detection method that serves as a base for several other works including those this paper evaluates.

references.paper_title: Focal loss for dense object detection
references.reason: This paper introduces the focal loss function, a key component in many modern object detection models, and the improvements are compared with this paper.
This paper introduces Mask R-CNN, a widely used method for instance segmentation. The authors also evaluate their proposed method on instance segmentation tasks.
This is a highly influential paper introducing DETR, a transformer-based object detection model that's compared against in this paper.
